subSections.title: Japanese
subSections.text: {{ja-kanji forms|k=y}} <!-- Note: Kyūjitai form of 海 is U+FA45 (CJK compatibility ideograph) -->

subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=2|rs=水06}}

# [[sea]], [[ocean]]
# [[vast]]ly [[gather]]ed
# [[large]], [[wide]]

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja}} {{wp|Sea}} {{wp|Ocean}}
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|うみ}} {{IPAfont|⟨umi1⟩}} → *{{IPAchar|/umij/}} → {{IPAchar|/umi/}} From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=うみ|-}}, from {{inh|ja|jpx-pro|*omi}}. Has been thought to have been derived from a compound. There are two leading theories regarding the ultimate derivation: * Shift from {{m|ja|大|tr=ō-||[[big]], [[great]]}} + {{m|ja|水|tr=mi||[[water]]|pos=combining form}}.{{R:Nipponica}} This is problematic phonetically because there is no known term having a related shift from {{IPAchar|/opo/}} → {{IPAchar|/oː/}} → {{IPAchar|/o/}} → {{IPAchar|/u/}}, and semantically as there already exists a compound {{m|ja|大水|tr=ōmizu||[[flood]]}}. * From {{m|ja|う|tr=u-|pos=stem indicating “[[ocean]]”}} + {{m|ja|水|tr=mi||water|pos=combining form}}. The ''u-'' stem is evident in {{m|ja|魚|tr=uo||[[fish]]}} and {{m|ja|潮|tr=ushio||[[salt water]]; [[tide]]}}

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: * {{ja-pron|yomi=k|うみ|acc=1|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
Usage notes
subSections.text: This is the most common general term in modern Japanese for ''{{m|en|sea}}'' or ''{{m|en|ocean}}''.

subSections.title: Derived terms
Idioms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|海を渡る|うみ を わたる|cross over the ocean → go to a foreign country}}

subSections.title: Proper noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|proper|うみ}}

# {{given name|female|lang=ja|A=a|nodot=1|sort=うみ}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|わた}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|わた}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=わた|obsolete}} [[sea]], [[ocean]]

subSections.title: Derived terms
Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|み}}
Either cognate with {{m|ja|水|tr=mi||[[water]]}}, or an abbreviation of ''umi'' above.

subSections.title: Pronunciation

{{ja-noun|み}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=み|obsolete}} [[sea]], [[ocean]]
